name: @junctionrelay/shader-rain-window
description: Rain on glass — realistic drops with refraction, trails, and fog over a background texture

junctionrelay.description: Rainy glass overlay. Drops roll down the surface leaving trails that cut through condensation fog. Tiny droplets scatter across the pane on hex-offset grids with breathing animation. The background texture refracts through each drop — sharp where water clears the surface, soft and foggy everywhere else.

uniforms.name: rainAmount
uniforms.description: Density of rain — controls settled droplets, large rolling drops, and small fast drops

uniforms.name: fogAmount
uniforms.description: How foggy the glass surface appears — higher values blur the background more
